<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div class="header-bar"><div class="grid-12 OAS_MOBILE("x60")</script></div></div></header><script>
      window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1025], ['tablet', 641], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999999px}</style><div 15.5c-3.04 0-5.5-2.46-5.5-5.5S6.96 4.5 10 4.5c3.03 0 5.5 2.46 5.5 5.5s-2.47 5.5-5.5 5.5z"/></symbol><symbol id="eixo-icone-feed"><path d="M4 3.15v4H0v11c0 1.66 1.34 3 3 3h19c1.1 0 2-.9 2-2v-16H4zm0 15.09c0 .5-.45.91-1 .91s-1-.41-1-.91V9.15h2v9.09zm18 .91H6v-14h16v14z"/><path d="M17 14.15c0 .55-.45 1-1 1h-6c-.55 0-1-.45-1-1s.45-1 1-1h6c.55 0 1 .45 1 1zm2-4c0 .55-.45 1-1 1h-8c-.55 class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Retrospectiva</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span desunida</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Em 24 de junho foi aprovada a saída britânica da União Europeia.

                xlarge-22 xlarge-offset-1"></div></div><div class="row show-for-medium-down"><div class="small-24 column publicidade-container"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_mobile_fim"><div id="banner_mobile_fim" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><footer id="glb-rodape" class="glb-rodape"><div id="glb-rodape" class="widget_rodape_container"><div class="css-header-g1" data-ga-area="css-header-g1"></div><script type="text/javascript">
    (function($) {
            $(document).ready(function(){
                glb.runner.run();

                Modernizr.load([
                    {
                        load: ['http://s.glbimg.com/bu/c/busca.padrao.suggest.css','http://s.glbimg.com/bu/j/jquery.buscaPadrao-v2.js'],

    .header-navegacao-color {
      color: #c4170c;
    }

      width: 26px;
      height: 16px;
    }

    }

      .has-not-regua .header-navegacao .header-title {
        padding: 0 24px 0 68px; 
      }
    }

    #catalogo-pagina .header-navegacao.header-g1 .header-title .header-editoria--link:not(.header-editoria-multiline) {
      display: inline-block;
      padding: 15px 0;
    }

    #catalogo-pagina .header-navegacao.header-g1 .floating-bar .header-title .header-title-content {
      padding: 3px 13px;
    }

      padding: 4px 0;
    }

      .header-navegacao .logo {
        width: 32px;
        height: 19px;
      }

      .header-navegacao .header-title {
        padding: 0 74px;  
      }

      #catalogo-pagina .header-navegacao.header-g1 .floating-bar .header-title .header-editoria--link.ellip-line {
        font-size: 28px;
      }

    }

    @media (min-width: 1065px) {
      .header-navegacao .header-title {
        padding: 0 145px;  
      }
    }
  </style><script>(function(){!function(){var n,e,t,o,r,l,i;i=function(){return/MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/},r=function(){return setActive(a){document.getElementById("main-menu-wrapper").removeAttribute("class");var b=document.getElementById(a);"iG_social"==a||document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),"active"==b.parentElement.getAttribute("class")?b.parentElement.setAttribute("class",""):b.parentElement.setAttribute("class","active")}function toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var c=document.getElementById(a),d=c.getAttribute("class");null==d?c.setAttribute("class",b):d.replace(/[\n\t]/g," ").indexOf(b)==-1?c.setAttribute("class",c.getAttribute("class")+" "+b):(y=d.split(b),""==y[0]?c.removeAttribute("class"):c.setAttribute("class",y[0]))}"jornais"==a?toogle("iG_jornais","opened"):"subcomportamento"==a&&toogle("iG_subcomportamento","opened"),"entretenimento"==a?toogle("iG_entretenimento","opened"):"servicos"==a&&toogle("iG_servicos","opened"),"ultimosegundo"==a?toogle("iG_ultimosegundo","opened"):"igtvig"==a&&toogle("iG_tvig","opened")}document.getElementById("iG_social_c").onclick=function(){setActive("iG_social")},document.getElementById("iG_mobile_menu_c").onclick=function(){toogle("main-menu-wrapper","opened")},document.getElementById("iG_comportamento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("subcomportamento","active")},document.getElementById("iG_jornais_c").onclick=function(){toogle("jornais","active")},document.getElementById("iG_servicos_c").onclick=function(){toogle("servicos","active")},document.getElementById("iG_ultimosegundo_c").onclick=function(){toogle("ultimosegundo","active")},document.getElementById("iG_tvig_c").onclick=function(){toogle("tvig","active")},document.getElementById("iG_entretenimento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("entretenimento","active")};</script></div></div><div
